description.narrative: Det övergripande målet med projektet är att ge ungdomar från ytterområdena kring Cochabamba och La Paz yrkesutbildning för att möjliggöra tillträde till arbetsmarknad och effektiv fattigdomsbekämpning.

The main objective of the project is that girls and boys, young women and men receive entrepreneur technical education that enable their participation in the development of their communities with support from their families and the community.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative:
General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2015Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: 1) 70% of 300 young people have concluded technical education in 2015.
2 training centres in La Paz and Cochabamba for 1000 young students (600 women and 400 men);
- organise family committees - provide training, equipment, guidance and support in contact with local authorities - provide for adequate training, through implementation of an entrepreneurial technical education approach - provide support to acquire identification documents and legal support.
3) Two capital funds to support at least 10 entrepreneurial projects during 2015 however 30 entrepreneurial projects has been supported during 2013-2015.
4) Two establish networks to support entrepreneurial projects
5) 100% organizations of the local community strengthened to promote technical education and advocacy with local authorities.
6) The methodology used by children's Village are implemented in 5 centre's of the Ministry of Education
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
